name: Asteroid Survival (Software Melon)
description:
Asteroid Survival

In Asteroid survival, you play as a lone space ranger, trying to survive an onslaught of asteroids, do everything you can to survive!

Gameplay:

Use W,A,S,D or arrow keys to move.

Use your mouse to aim and left click to shoot.

Destroy asteroids to increase your score.

Dont miss your shots to increase your combo.

And try not to die ;)

This game is still in development so please let me know of any bugs you encounter!

Version: 0.2 alpha

Game made by : Gorkem Sarac
